hero.title: Securing AI Models,
hero.description: We protect organizations from the new frontier of risks in AI and cybersecurity. From LLM red teaming to runtime defenses, Aynigma Guard makes AI adoption safe, compliant, and resilient.

contact.title: Let's secure
contact.description: Tell us about your use cases. We'll share a tailored demo.

solutions.title: AI Security,
solutions.description: The rise of Generative AI brings enormous opportunity—and unprecedented risks. We deliver a complete platform to test, monitor, and defend your AI systems.

redTeaming.title: AI Red Teaming
redTeaming.description: Stress-test models against jailbreaks, prompt injection, and adversarial attacks.

runtimeProtection.title: Runtime Protection
runtimeProtection.description: Filter and monitor inputs/outputs in real time to prevent abuse and data leaks.

agenticSecurity.title: Agentic AI Security
agenticSecurity.description: Safeguard multi-agent workflows from indirect prompt injection and chaining.

compliance.title: Compliance & Governance
compliance.description: Map AI risks to NCA ECC and PDPL. Automate evidence and reporting.

whyAynigma.title: Built for Saudi.
whyAynigma.description: Modular, compliance-ready, and designed for real enterprise environments.

enterpriseGrade.title: Enterprise-Grade
enterpriseGrade.description: Proven OSS cores, orchestrated for scale & reliability.

complianceReady.title: Compliance-Ready
complianceReady.description: Out-of-the-box mapping to NCA,ECC and PDPL,

futureProof.title: Future-Proof
futureProof.description: Plug-in architecture to evolve with AI threats.

government.title: Government & Smart Cities
government.description: Secure AI at giga-project scale (e.g., NEOM).

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Safeguard medical AI, PHI, and uptime.

smes.title: SMEs
smes.description: Accessible AI security for growing teams.

product.title: One platform. Multiple defenses.
product.subtitle: Runtime Safety • Red Team Fuzzing • Agentic

redTeamFuzzing.title: Red Team Fuzzing
redTeamFuzzing.description: Uncover vulnerabilities before attackers do with automated and guided fuzzing.

runtimeSafety.title: Runtime Safety
runtimeSafety.description: Real-time classification, filtering, and policy enforcement across inputs/outputs.

agentic.title: Agentic
agentic.description: Risk detection for autonomous & multi-agent systems with chain-of-thought hygiene.

complianceRisk.title: Compliance & Risk Register

marquee.text: Aligned with NCA, ECC, and PDPL Compliance Standards

footer.description: Securing the future of AI, one model at a time.
